basic_info.description: Born and raised in the Twin Cities, my hobbies keep me very busy when I'm not coding. I love to learn, and aside from continuing to hone my dev skills, I've been learning French, Korean, dance, candle-making, and D&D. I love games of all sorts: whetehr it's board, card, video, or roleplaying, I'm always down to game! I can't get enough of cosplay, K-Pop, art, camping, animals, karaoke, and trivia, and dearly wish I was a better gardener. Disability advocacy is one of my biggest passions, and I dream of creating things that combine this with my creativity, coding skills, and love of gaming.

projects.title: Dogmelon Desiderata
projects.description: My side hustle, Dogmelon Desiderata: Selling homemade soy candles made with custom blends of essential oils, dried flora, and upcycled teacups/teapots.

projects.title: Gish
projects.description: Gish, aka the Greatest International Scavenger Hunt (the world has ever seen): A week-long sprint to complete as many creative, bizarre, and charitable challenges as possible. Scavenger hunt challenges have included making a portrait of a Spice Girl out of spices, modeling aquarium fashion, create a portrait of a beloved celebrity out of pet hair, model a dress made of flowers in a flowerless place, portray a superhero doing a mundane household chore, show what would happen if a zombie took over your job, model a fancy kale hat at a fancy event, and paint the Queen as a clicker zombie.

projects.title: Pets
projects.description: I'm a pretty big fan of my cat Teen Wolf, ball python Melhissandre, and late beagle soulmate, Zoey.
